name: Danplace
description:
In Danplace, you are trapped in an unknown and dangerous place, to escape you need to lower bridges and fight to survive the dangers of this terrible place.

Dangers:

Giant


This enemy is big and strong, beware of him!

Human


This is a human, he is the weakest enemy, but he has a sharp axe.

Spider


The spider is the strongest and most resistant enemy, be careful when facing it!

CHARACTERISTICS:

- 3D Hand painted graphics

- Simple combat
- Short duration (20 to 40 minutes)
